T02D1738:105b-0: @105b * // sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor chog bzhugs /
T02D1738:105b-2: # // rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1738:105b-3: gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pa yis //
T02D1738:105b-4: mtshan ldan bkra shis snod de ni //
T02D1738:105b-5: sha dang bdud rtsi sna lnga dang //
T02D1738:105b-6: khrag dang chang sna tshogs kyis dgang //
T02D1738:105b-7: rlung dang skyed bu me yis bskol //
T02D1738:105b-8: sku gsung thugs sngags sbyangs nas ni //
T02D1738:105b-9: rang mdun 'khor lo mchod nas ni //
T02D1738:105b-10: sngags kyis btab la 'dod gsol gdab //
T02D1738:105b-11: bshags dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
T02D1738:105b-12: nam: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a na /
T02D1738:106a-0: @106a * // he he bha ga ba ti /
T02D1738:106a-3: ma bi lam pa t'a ra ae ka dz'a ti /
T02D1738:106a-4: ai dam ba lim grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D1738:106a-5: sarba bi sa re sv'a h'a /
T02D1738:106a-6: h'um padma rigs kyi lha tshogs dang //
T02D1738:106a-7: thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
T02D1738:106a-8: rje btsun sgrol ma ral gcig ma //
T02D1738:106a-9: mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni //
T02D1738:106a-10: dkar mo dang ni stobs chen mo //
T02D1738:106a-11: rtsub mo dang ni rlag byed ma //
T02D1738:106a-12: nag mo mtshan mo nag mo dang //
T02D1738:106a-13: srung ba mo dang sbed byed ma //
T02D1738:106a-14: tshangs mo dang ni rig byed ma //
T02D1738:106a-15: gsang ba mo dang bkra shis ma //
T02D1738:106a-16: ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1738:106a-17: grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma //
T02D1738:106a-18: bsod nams gter dang mthar byed ma //
T02D1738:106a-19: drag mo brtul zhugs chen mo dang //
T02D1738:106a-20: phan mdzad ma dang skyabs byed ma //
T02D1738:106a-21: don grub dang ni nor ster ma //
T02D1738:106a-22: ral pa gcig ma 'khor dang bcas //
T02D1738:106a-23: dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1738:106a-24: ma mo mkha' 'gro ma lus dang //
T02D1738:106a-25: lha dang lha min thams cad rnams //
T02D1738:106a-26: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsnams la //
T02D1738:106a-27: bdag la dngos grub gsol 'debs pas //
T02D1738:106a-28: zang zing lo tog 'bras bu rnams //
T02D1738:106a-29: rin po che ni sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1738:106a-31: ro brgya'i zas dang sna tshogs zas //
T02D1738:106a-32: btung ba kha mngar chang sna tshogs //
T02D1738:106a-33: gos bzang srab 'jam sna tshogs dang ;
T02D1738:106a-35: zhing dang khang pa zangs 'dod 'jo bar //
T02D1738:106a-36: 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral bar mdzod //
T02D1738:106a-37: bcud len tshe ring nad med mdzod //
T02D1738:106a-38: phyogs skyong sde brgyad tshogs rnams dang //
T02D1738:106a-39: 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal bar mdzod //
T02D1738:106a-40: ral gri mig sman bum pa bzang //
T02D1738:106a-41: rkang mgyogs gter dang longs spyod dang //
T02D1738:106a-42: blo rno shes rab tshigs bshad dang //
T02D1738:106a-43: snyan dngags ma thos chos shes shog / rgyal rigs la sogs rigs bzhi rnams //
T02D1738:106a-44: 'gro ba dbang du 'du bar shog / rigs drug
T02D1738:106a-45: ngan song lcags grol shog / gnod dang bdud rnams
T02D1738:106a-46: bar chod zhi // tshe dang stobs dang 'khor rgyas shing //
T02D1738:106a-47: tshe dang chos dang bstan pa dang //
T02D1738:106a-48: bla ma'i sku dgra skad cig sgrol //
T02D1738:106a-49: rtag tu gar skyes gar gnas kyang //
T02D1738:106a-50: gsang sngags lam dang mi 'bral zhing //
T02D1738:106b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo longs spyod shog / mdor na rang la ci @106b 'dod pa //
T02D1738:106b-1: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang //
T02D1738:106b-2: mi 'dod thams cad myur bral nas //
T02D1738:106b-3: sems can kun gyi don grub shog / thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs //
T02D1738:106b-4: rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal mthong shog / ral pa gcig pa'i dngos grub gnyis //
T02D1738:106b-5: bsams shing bsgrub pas myur thob shog / rje btsun
T02D1738:106b-6: sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga / slob
T02D1738:106b-7: dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
